name: UpdateIncidentTodo
description:
Update a specific incident todo in Datadog.

Use this tool to update details of a specific todo associated with an incident in Datadog. This is useful when you need to modify tasks related to incident management.

parameters.name: incident_uuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the incident to be updated.

parameters.name: incident_todo_uuid
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the incident todo to be updated.

value_schema.description: The UUID of the incident todo.

parameters.name: incident_todo_payload
parameters.description: JSON object containing the incident todo data, including attributes like content, assignees, timestamps, and type.

completed.description: Timestamp when the todo was completed.

created.description: Timestamp when the incident todo was created.

due_date.description: Timestamp when the todo should be completed by.

incident_id.description: UUID of the incident this todo is connected to.

modified.description: Timestamp when the incident todo was last modified.

data.description: Incident todo data for a patch request.
